page.title: 15Symud o Gorris gan Mair
page.content:
Pan fu raid raid ini symud o Gorris i'r Drenewydd yr oeddwn yn teimlo yn drist.Ond hefyd fe edrychwn ymlaen at wneud ffrindiau newydd.A pan ddechreuais yn ysgol Maesyrhandir fe wnes lawer o ffrindiau newydd.Ond dim ond yfi a allai siarad Cymraeg.Yn ysgol Corris yr oedd mwy na hanner y plant yn gallu siarad Cymraeg.
When we had to move from Corris to Newtown I felt sad.But I also looked forwards to making new friends.And when I started in Maesyrhandir school I made many new friends.But I was the only one who could speak Welsh.In{ Corris school more than half the children could speak Welsh.
